mapper.select: select * from (select e.*, row_number() over(order by faq_id desc) as rn from ((select faq_id,faq_category,faq_title,faq_content,faq_write_date,faq_view_count, member_id,(select member_username from member where faq.member_id=member.member_id) as member_username from faq order by faq_id) e)) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select member_username from member where member_id = #{value}
mapper.update: update faq set faq_category = #{faq_category}, faq_title = #{faq_title}, faq_content= #{faq_content} where faq_id = #{faq_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from (select faq_id,faq_category,faq_title,faq_content,faq_write_date,faq_view_count, member_id,(select member_username from member where faq.member_id=member.member_id) as member_username from faq order by faq_id) where ${select} like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
